page.title: 10CLUBS IN GORDON (1985)
page.content: Here is a list of clubs and where they are. Football_park ,netball_Gordon school,fitness_school,tennis_park dancing_school,badminton_school, horse riding Nenthorn,bowling_park and Monday club_school. Clubs are run by approved instructors to teach people . Clubs are very useful because your are learning the right way. Here is one of the clubs I like. Dancing is taught by Miss Smith. She is a very good teacher because she says every thing clearly. Here is one of the dances we have done "A JIG FOR MS DUNN". I feel that there should be a swimming pool in Gordon. There is a dangerous river near by in which a lot of children swim.I think that a swimming pool would be safer.
